Complete Microsoft Office 2007, with nothing removed, added, or modified. This is clean silent unattended installation with key and everything added. 

Silent Unattended - This means that you do not have to click ANYTHING!


Instructions

1. This is a .iso, so burn this to a cd. 
2. Put this in the computer you want office on, it autoruns, just walk away :D. 
3. Done.


More information about silent/unattended installations
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silent_installation



This also puts word and a few others directly on the desktop, and when it is loading a command prompt window will pop up for 2-5 mins and go away when its finished.
